column5: Couldn't make our intended trip to Pickle or Bulldozer outposts this summer with my US Army son as his schedule got too uncertain. We are hoping for next year. We originally were going to go to Pickle, but it booked before we could, and then we booked Bulldozer. We are hoping to hit one of them next year. Does anyone have any reports to share of their summer 2014 adventures.....especially on Pickle or Bulldozer camps?
